title: american watercolor society exhibition
description: The 158th international exhibition showcases works by 150 artists from around the world.

title: angelika classics screening series
description: Village East by Angelika's newest series celebrates iconic films.

title: clothing swap
description: Refresh your wardrobe by swapping out under-used clothes for new-to-you finds.

title: biology on tap: silly science
description: Bio and beer blend at the Biology on Tap speaker series.

title: the iron mule short comedy film festival
description: Join hosts for a collection of short comedy films about demon hunters, heavenly signs, and more.

title: miss manhattan non-fiction reading series: 11th anniversary
description: Monthly showcase for nonfiction writers celebrates its 11th anniversary.

title: bargemusic
description: Bargemusic's chamber music concerts return to Brooklyn Bridge Park, hosted at Pier 5's boathouse.

title: schneider concerts chamber music series at the new school
description: Showcasing emerging musicians and ensembles, the New School’s annual chamber music series returns for the 2024-2025 season.

description: Brooklyn’s Regina Opera presents a concert of operatic and instrumental masterpieces.

title: rejected shorts
description: Writer and comedian Michelle Cohn hosts a show where NYC writers and comedians celebrate scorned satire.

description: Norwegian adventurer Erling Kagge discusses his book with actor Timothy Hutton.

title: isola sundays: hosted by hannibal buress
description: Comedian Hannibal Buress hosts a stand-up showcase at his new Williamsburg venue.

description: Film for good brings folks together for a movie night and a stripped down musical performance.

title: hari kondabolu: new material night
description: Comedian Hari Kondabolu works out an hour of new standup.

title: solving your problems with chloe troast
description: Comedian Chloe Troast and her comedy pals tackle the audience’s problems through improv.

title: japan fes japanese food festival
description: Broadway bet 8th + 9th streets (Sat); Broadway bet 103 + 104th streets (Sun). Free admission (pay-as-you-go).

title: brooklyn whiskey + spirits fest
description: Industry City – Building 5 (indoor event venue). Save 40% with promo code ‘theskint’.

title: 27th annual nyc tartan day parade with grand marshal alan cumming
description: Steps off at West 45th Street and marches up 6th Avenue to 55th Street.

title: jersey city night market: latin food + music festival
description: City Hall ancillary lot. Free admission (pay-as-you-go).

description: Enjoy free admission, extended hours, and special programming at Poster House’s first Friday.

title: lower east stories
description: P+T Knitwear Bookstore + Café (LES) presents a new storytelling salon. Tonight’s theme: ‘fools.’ Hosted by Matt Storrs.

title: immigrant jam comedy
description: Caveat (LES), featuring immigrant and first generation comedians.

title: paperclip
description: Douglas Widick presents his one-man musical about Clippy, Microsoft’s failed virtual assistant.

title: vampire ball: mars ray + the raptures single release show

title: transplants comedy show
description: Funny folks from all over tell jokes and stories about where they came from and how they got here.

title: bitches brew comedy show
description: This women-produced and-hosted comedy show conjures up big laughs in the back room of Halyards (Gowanus).
